comment: при клике на обжи на свалке в начале главы

languages.text: Широкая пасть желоба расплывается в добродушной усмешке, словно обещая в скором времени отрыгнуть еще пару покойников вам в приятели.
The wide maw of the chute stretches into a mellow grin, as if promising to disgorge a few more bodies to keep you company.
languages.original_text: Широкая пасть желоба расплывается в добродушной усмешке, словно обещая в скором времени отрыгнуть еще пару покойников вам в приятели.

traits.locale_text: The wide maw of the chute stretches into a mellow grin, as if promising to disgorge a few more bodies to keep you company.
The wide maw of the chute stretches into a mellow grin, as if promising to disgorge a few more bodies to keep you company.

The wide maw of the chute stretches into a mellow grin, as if promising to disgorge a few more bodies to keep you company.
The wide maw of the chute stretches into a mellow grin, as if promising to disgorge a few more bodies to keep you company.

languages.text: シュートの大きなマウが、穏やかな笑みを浮かべながら広がっていく。まるであなたの相手をする遺体を、さらに数体差し出すと約束しているかのようだ。
languages.original_text: The wide maw of the chute stretches into a mellow grin, as if promising to disgorge a few more bodies to keep you company.

traits.locale_text: シュートの大きなマウが、穏やかな笑みを浮かべながら広がっていく。まるであなたの相手をする遺体を、さらに数体差し出すと約束しているかのようだ。

languages.text: 滑槽的巨口仿佛露出了怡然自得的笑容，似乎打算再吐出几具尸体，与你作伴。
languages.original_text: The wide maw of the chute stretches into a mellow grin, as if promising to disgorge a few more bodies to keep you company.

traits.locale_text: 滑槽的巨口仿佛露出了怡然自得的笑容，似乎打算再吐出几具尸体，与你作伴。

languages.text: Las anchas fauces del mecanismo se curvan en una sonrisa melosa, como si prometieran vomitar más cuerpos para hacerte compañía.
languages.original_text: The wide maw of the chute stretches into a mellow grin, as if promising to disgorge a few more bodies to keep you company.

traits.locale_text: Las anchas fauces del mecanismo se curvan en una sonrisa melosa, como si prometieran vomitar más cuerpos para hacerte compañía.

languages.text: Der breite Schlund der Rutsche streckt sich zu einem entspannten Grinsen, als würde er versprechen, noch ein paar Leichen auszuspucken, die dir Gesellschaft leisten.
languages.original_text: The wide maw of the chute stretches into a mellow grin, as if promising to disgorge a few more bodies to keep you company.

traits.locale_text: Der breite Schlund der Rutsche streckt sich zu einem entspannten Grinsen, als würde er versprechen, noch ein paar Leichen auszuspucken, die dir Gesellschaft leisten.

languages.text: L'embouchure du conduit forme un rictus suave, comme s'il s'apprêtait à cracher quelques cadavres supplémentaires pour vous tenir compagnie.
languages.original_text: The wide maw of the chute stretches into a mellow grin, as if promising to disgorge a few more bodies to keep you company.

traits.locale_text: L'embouchure du conduit forme un rictus suave, comme s'il s'apprêtait à cracher quelques cadavres supplémentaires pour vous tenir compagnie.

languages.text: Oluğun geniş ağzı, sana eşlik edecek birkaç bedeni daha kusacağını belirtircesine hafifçe gülümsüyor.
languages.original_text: The wide maw of the chute stretches into a mellow grin, as if promising to disgorge a few more bodies to keep you company.

traits.locale_text: Oluğun geniş ağzına, sana eşlik etmesi için birkaç bedeni daha kusacağına söz verircesine hafif bir gülümseme yerleşiyor.
